content: MQT-U Beam clamp Galvanized beam clamp for connecting the open side or back of strut channels directly to steel beams ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > System connectors and interfaces- - - ### FEATURES:Features Single-piece beam clamp â€“ for quicker and easier installation with no loose parts Works in both open and slotted-side of strut to reduce the number of different strut clamps on a job-site Applications Compatible with multiple strut channels Recommended for use in dry, interior environments Compatible with steel beams with max. flange thickness of 1 in ### TECHNICAL DATA: Wrench size: 17 mm Tightening torque: N/A ft-lbf Material composition: S355 MC - DIN EN 10149-2, Screw: strength class 8.8, Plastic: PA 6.6 Technical Data | Material composition | S355 MC - DIN EN 10149-2, Screw: strength class 8.8, Plastic: PA 6.6 | Surface finish | Indoor Coated - Electro galvanized | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor conditions (C1) Indoor with temporary condensation (C2) ### ITEMS- 2301108 - Beam clamp MQT-U - Package Size 10 pc
